category: Sports Fair Committee Regulations/Article 23-2 (Request for disciplinary action)
contents: Article 23-2 (Request for disciplinary action) ① If there is a person who falls under the grounds for disciplinary action under Article 25 (1) 1 through 8, the Sports Council shall request a disciplinary decision from the committee, and impose disciplinary action according to the results of the decision. shall. ② When the Athletic Association requests the Committee to resolve disciplinary action pursuant to Paragraph 1, it shall conduct a sufficient investigation into the reason for disciplinary action and submit to the Committee the materials necessary to prove the reason for disciplinary action among the following items. 1. Investigation results or investigation records regarding the charges 2. Measures taken against the relevant person and evidence thereof 3. Materials supporting disciplinary action such as related regulations and instruction documents 4. Evidence materials such as official documents that can prove the charges [New article added] 2022. 12. 26.]
